name: KELLOGG BROWN & ROOT SERVICES, INC., et al., petitioners, v. UNITED STATES, ex rel. Benjamin CARTER.
name_abbreviation: Kellogg Brown & Root Servs., Inc. v. United States ex rel. Carter

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
KELLOGG BROWN & ROOT SERVICES, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES, ex rel. Benjamin CARTER.
attorneys: Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of National Defense Industrial Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted.
casebody.head_matter:
KELLOGG BROWN & ROOT SERVICES, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES, ex rel. Benjamin CARTER.
No. 12-1497.
Supreme Court of the United States
July 1, 2014.
Case below, 710 F.3d 171.
Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of National Defense Industrial Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted.
